official_title: A bill to extend the Older Americans Act of 1965 for 5 years.

summary.text: Older Americans Amendments of 1981 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations for specified programs through fiscal year 1986.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Older Americans Act of 1965 for 5 years.
